title: Roger Drury (died 1599)
text:
Roger Drury (died 1599) of <a href="Rollesby">Rollesby</a> and <a href="Great%20Yarmouth">Great Yarmouth</a>, <a href="Norfolk">Norfolk</a>, was an English politician.
He was a <a href="Member%20of%20Parliament">Member</a> (MP) of the <a href="Parliament%20of%20England">Parliament of England</a> for <a href="Great%20Yarmouth%20%28UK%20Parliament%20constituency%29">Great Yarmouth</a> in 1589.
